original: Hall, Sven; Adolf Sture, komminister, Tidaholm, f. 23/10/13 i Töreboda, Skarab. 1., av Rikard Svensson o. Anna Hall. G. 40 m. Ingrid Ericson. Barn : Lars f. 42, Gudrun 43. — Stud:-ex. i Skara 32, teol. fik ex. i Gbg 33, teol. kand. i Lund 37, prästv. f. Skara stift 38. Pastorsadj. i Trollhättan 38-40, kyrkoadj. där 40’-46, kommin. i Ti-daliolm sed. 46.
translated: Hall, Sven; Adolf Sture, minister, Tidaholm, born on October 23rd, 1913 in Töreboda, Skaraborg County, the first child of Rikard Svensson and Anna Hall. Married in 1940 to Ingrid Ericson. Children: Lars born in 1942, Gudrun born in 1943. He passed his final exams at Skara in 1932, received his theological degree in Gothenburg in 1933, obtained a theological candidate degree in Lund in 1937, and was ordained as a pastor in Skara in 1938. He worked as a pastor's assistant in Trollhättan from 1938 to 1940 and as a church assistant from 1940 to 1946, then became a minister in Tidaholm from 1946 onwards.
